Home » 34Y8 Cittayamakapāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.1 Suddhacittasāmañña » 2.1.2 Dhammavāra
2.1.2.9 Nirujjhamānuppannavāra
Niddesa
Suddhacittasāmañña
Dhammavāra
Nirujjhamānuppannavāra
98.
462»  Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
463«  Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānanti?
464Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhamānañca.
465»  Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
466Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
467«  Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānanti? Āmantā.
<< 2.1.2.8 Uppajjamānuppannavāraup2.1.2.10 Uppannuppādavāra >>
